Literature.Title: Novel β-Hairpin Peptide from Marine Polychaeta with a High Efficacy against Gram-Negative Pathogens
Literature.Author: Safronova VN, Bolosov IA, Kruglikov RN, Korobova OV, Pereskokova ES, Borzilov AI, Panteleev PV, Ovchinnikova TV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=0.125µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.125µM),Escherichia coli 214(MIC=0.125µM),Escherichia coli 1057(MIC=0.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=0.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.125µM),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 2675(MIC=0.125µM),Enterobacter cloacae 4172(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=0.25-1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=1µM),Bacillus licheniformis VKM B-511(MIC=1µM),Bacillus licheniformis VKM B-511(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis VKM B-886(MIC=4µM)
